body: The lints that were leftover were because I forgot to commit the .eslint file I added to the old control interface. I also fixed the test failures I introduced. I disabled a few rules in the old interface to avoid making too many changes.
body_text: The lints that were leftover were because I forgot to commit the .eslint file I added to the old control interface. I also fixed the test failures I introduced. I disabled a few rules in the old interface to avoid making too many changes.
